metadata.summary: Send Hayabusa Windows event log analysis results to BigQuery for SQL-based threat hunting at scale
metadata.primary_use_case: Analyze Windows event logs from hundreds or thousands of systems using Hayabusa and BigQuery

extracted_apis.description: Configure BigQuery output for Hayabusa events with timesketch-verbose profile schema

extracted_apis.path: computer:STRING, message:STRING, timestamp:STRING, details:STRING, channel:STRING, event_id:STRING, level:STRING, mitre_tactics:STRING, mitre_tags:STRING, extra:STRING
extracted_apis.description: BigQuery table schema for Hayabusa timesketch-verbose CSV output

cross_refs.description: Base BigQuery output configuration that this tutorial builds upon
